message.content:
I need to identify the net addition in the amount of cash and cash equivalents during the period, along with its component sub-items.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the "Net Increase" line item with a value of -862455.97. This represents the net change in cash and cash equivalents during the period.

The two component sub-items that make up this net change are:
1. "Beginning Balance" of cash and cash equivalents: 8000000.00
2. "Ending Balance" of cash and cash equivalents: 7137544.03

The net increase (-862455.97) equals the ending balance minus the beginning balance:
7137544.03 - 8000000.00 = -862455.97

This confirms that these are the correct sub-items.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-862455.97', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value1': '8000000.00', 'sub_item value2': '7137544.03'}}}
```
